title: Hawaii Flights from $246+ on United
text:

In spite of the many attributes the Aloha State can boast of (amazing sunsets, killer waves, strong cocktails, etc.), it can't usually offer cheap flights. That's why looking out for Hawaii sale fares is crucial. United Airlines has just debuted a limited-time sale with flights to Honolulu, Kahului, Kona, and Lihue, and departures from a vast number of continental U.S. cities. One-way fares start at $246, round-trip at $492. 
The sale flights are valid for travel Mondays - Thursdays during August 24 - December 17, but tickets must be booked at least seven days in advance and by August 31. These rates are not valid for travel to Hawaii on November 20 - 25 or for travel from Hawaii on November 27 - 30. A Saturday-night minimum stay is required.   We found the best prices for   this sale by   this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros: Valid most days of the week, and from many departure cities. Cons: Still, the sale excludes weekends. Verdict: Best for those with vacation days to spare. SEARCH FOR THIS DEAL!
